sourcesContent:
import Head from "next/head"; import {Power2,gsap,TweenLite} from "gsap"; import {useRef,useEffect} from "react" export default function Base({children,route}){ const hamburger = useRef(null); const rubriques = useRef(null); const rubriques_mobile = useRef(null); //const rubriques_mobile_item = useRef(null) gsap.defaults = { duration: 5000 } const menuTL = gsap.timeline({ paused: true }) useEffect(() => { menuTL .add(TweenLite.to(hamburger.current, { left: "unset", right: 0, ease: Power2.easeOut, }) ) .add( TweenLite.to(rubriques.current, { height: "auto", ease: Power2.easeOut }, "-=1") ) .add( TweenLite.to(rubriques_mobile.current, { transform: "translateX(0)", ease: Power2.easeOut }, "-=1") ) .add( TweenLite.from(rubriques_mobile.current.children, { transform: "translateX(-100%)", opacity: 0, ease: Power2.easeOut, delay: (index, element, all) => { return index * 0.2 } }, '-=1') ) .reverse() },[]) const handleClick = function () { if (menuTL.reversed()) { menuTL.play() } else { menuTL.reverse() } } return(
